I installed this app after reading how great it was. Boy was I mistaken. I‚Äôm vigilant on password management and involved in cyber security. After installing the app I received a ransomware email stating they had my password and I needed to send Bitcoin money or my information would be put on the dark web. The email had my partial password and the only place I put it was on this app. My email address was than accessed from a location in the Russia. Coincidence? I think not. 
I‚Äôm not blaming the company directly but I would question their security protocols. My phone and computer are both behind a firewall and VPN.
